participant_1.background: i love to play board games. my parents were also teachers. my favorite band is up and i got to see them in concert once. for vacation i enjoy time at the beach.

participant_2.background: i'm 100 years old. i'm very strong for my age. i feel like i might live forever. i remember when nobody had a television. i love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight.

content.text: I love the beach, the beach, and the beach is my favorite place.
